content: सत्यवत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Truthful, veracious. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>N.</ab> of a king, husband of Sāvitrī, <ab>q. v.</ab> --ती {@--1@} N of the daughter of a fisherman, who became mother of Vyāsa by the sage Parāśara. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the wife of <ls>Nārada.</ls> {@--3@} Of the wife of Ṛcīka.
